Alteration 2

Quicken Self

effect number [effect_number]: 10

casting time [casttime]: 100%
area of effect [aoe_s]: Caster
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 20-
Bless/Buff: Quickness
 
(Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], May Use Underwater [uwok])
Quickness increases the speed of the caster and enhances his ability to dodge and evade incoming attacks. The quickened one can perform regular combat actions twice every turn, but still cannot cast more than one spell per combat round.
